ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Resist question
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Never say never.  He got a gravity flux on me last night with 167 MR.  I resisted all the other ones though. I ve yet to resist Innoruk s gravity flux, but
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 20 Mar 2000, Ryan Honeyman wrote:
>
> And you probably never will outright resist an NPC lifetap.
> If your Magic Resist is close to 100, he will never Grav Flux
> however. (Not that it hurts that bad for us, with Safe Fall)

Never say never. He got a gravity flux on me last night with
167 MR. I resisted all the other ones though.

I've yet to resist Innoruk's gravity flux, but for some reason
high MR seems to decrease the damage you take from it. The
first time I fought him, I got tossed 3-4 times before my hp
bar ever showed any white.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
